column1: Table 3. Number of sentenced prisoners admitted to and released from state and federal jurisdiction, 2000-2008
Authors: William J. Sabol, Ph.D., Heather C. West, Ph.D., and Matthew Cooper
Table 3: Number of sentenced prisoners admitted to and released from state and federal jurisdiction, 2000-2008
Note: Totals based on prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year. Totals exclude transfers, escapes, and AWOLS.
